duck: projected definition: to devise in the mind.
Projected is an American rock supergroup consisting of Sevendust members John Connolly and Vinnie Hornsby, Alter Bridge and Creed drummer Scott Phillips, and former Submersed guitarist Eric Friedman.

Vinnie Hornsby

Scott | Phillips }} 'Projected' is an American rock supergroup consisting of Sevendust members John Connolly and Vinnie Hornsby, Alter Bridge and Creed drummer Scott Phillips, and former Submersed guitarist Eric Friedman. The band released one album, [[Human (Projected album)|Human]], in June 2012, before falling into inactivity as Connolly and Hornsby returned to Sevendust in late 2012.
